item.title: SPLA-IO declares decisive phase of war, orders restraint toward civilians - Sudans Post
item.description: SPLA-IO declares decisive phase of war, orders restraint toward civilians Sudans PostSouth Sudan army chief gives soldiers seven days to crush rebellion BBCSSPDF orders civilian evacuation from SPLA-IO areas ahead of Jonglei offensive Sudans PostSouth Sudan opposition forces call for march on Juba after battlefield gains ReutersSouth Sudan repels attack on garrison town Big News Network.com
